title: Changing Client and In-game Font
body:
Hey guys,

I'm trying to change my client and in-game font to the ones used on the Korean servers. I've tried using the tutorials, but they are all outdated. Anyone know how to do this with the new client?

replies.body: The KR servers run a bit different and might use some different fonts that appeal more to their playerbase. You cannot edit the game files to change the font officially, and doing so could run the risk of breaking your version of the game install.
